title: [In-Game Bug] Azir Soldiers Broke Their Spears
body:
If Azir's soldiers move too fast and far their spears break wielding them as useless soldiers that sit there doing nothing on the battlefield!

Okay, the bug goes that if you tell your Sand Soldiers to move a certain distance over a lengthy distance the soldiers' basic attacks no longer deal damage, this is actually a pretty majour gameplay bug seeing as how the soldiers are all of Azir's damage output. This can be replicated 100% of the time. Just not sure how long the distance needs to be to displace the sand soldier to disable the basic attack damage.

~ Stacona

replies.body: Thanks for this post!  We are aware of the issue and hope to have a fix ready in the near future.
